description:
Product Description:Features future-proof USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 connectivity (both cables included). Open docking bay for easy dock/undock of bare/internal SATA drives. Connect a single 3.5" or 2.5" SATA drive at SuperSpeed USB 3.0 transfer rates (up to 10x as fast as USB 2.0). Backward compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.1 at their native speeds. Practical transfer rates with USB 3.0 will vary by machine, typically between 500Mbps and 2Gbps. Simple SATA drive dockLightweight (7.6 oz) and simple design so it's easy to connect and use. Simply slide drives gently into top of docking station, with SATA connectors aligned. Do not exert force. Drives will attach and rest on the SATA connector with the drive centered in the dock, with space for airflow on all sides. Technical Specifications* Supports USB 1.1/2.0/3.0 and SATA I/II* SuperSpeed USB 3.0 data transfer rate up to 5Gbps* SATA II transfer rate up to 3Gbps* Supports ATA/ATAPI device* Features LucidPort chipset* Supported OS  -Linux
  -Windows: 2000/XP/VISTA/7/8
  -MAC OSX: 10.4 Tiger/10.5 Leopard/10.6 Snow Leopard/10.7 Lion/10.8 Mountain Lion(*2012 Mac Mini and MacBook Pro with Retina Display are not recommended for use with this product*) Package Content* USB 3.0 to SATA HDD Docking Station (using LucidPort USB300 Chipset)*  USB 3.0 Cable* 12V 2A AC power adapter* User manual
title: SABRENT USB 3.0/2.0 SATA Hard Drive Docking Station (LucidPort chipset And 3TB+ Support) DSH-USB30
